txt.en: The wheel is damaged and broken. It does not look like it is possible to repair it here on the road. If Andras is to continue on, a new wheel must be found. \n\nThe Dragon-clan camp to the east would be a good place to start looking for a new wheel.
With a tug and a jolt, the old wheel comes off. The new one slides on with ease. It is not the sturdiest wheel you have handled, but it should last the short trip to the next town.
The more you look at this wheel, the more convinced you become that its only future use will be as fire-wood.
The cart's wheel is damaged and broken. For Andras to continue on, a new one will need to be found.
Found a new wheel for the cart
Find a new wheel for the cart
The camp of the Dragon-clan raiders to the east may be a place to find new wheel.\n\nA new wheel for the cart must be found before it can continue on.
The broken wheel is at Andras' cart on the road in northern Starkmoor.\n\nNow that you have found a new wheel you should replace the old broken one.
